name: Turkle
description:
A COMPLETELY FREE word guessing game for Windows, with NO ADS, no distactions - just fun.

Play with keyboard or mouse.

Choose your word length and difficulty.

Track your progress with detailed stats, including best time and average time.

 Separate stats are kept for each word-length, difficulty combo so you can compare like with like, and monitor your improvements.

For each difficuly and word-length combo, the target word lists are the same for all players of Turkle, so you can compare your results with your friends.

Check out  Turkle videos on my youtube channel:

https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCklVMs1ibJMDIjOrID4L7FA
